structureObjectRule.objectUse: Close Requirements will not contain attributes
attribute used
reasonForAmendment is allowed in graphic
changeInLine allowed to identify the changes with in the element.
Caption not allowed
Required person information are not allowed in this project
Zonal References are not allowed.
Access Points References are not allowed.
Any symbol should have a ICN number assigned to it.
Verbatim Text are not allowed.
Circuit Breakers information are not allowed.
Control and Indicators are not allowed.
Quantity Types are allowed
Quantity GroupType are allowed and use the quantity Unit of measure from the drop down.
Quantity Tolerance Type are allowed and use the quantity Unit of measure from the drop down.
attribute used
Levelled Para Identification number
Procedural Step Identification number
Multimedia Object Identification number
Levelled Para Identification number
Only when the reference target is a figure can the value of attribute internalRefTargetType be irtt01.
Only when the reference target is a Table can the value of attribute internalRefTargetType be irtt02.
Only when the reference target is a Supply can the value of attribute internalRefTargetType be irtt04.
Only when the reference target is a Support Equipment can the value of attribute internalRefTargetType be irtt05.
Only when the reference target is a Supply can the value of attribute internalRefTargetType be irtt06.
Only when the reference target is a Levelled Para can the value of attribute internalRefTargetType be irtt07.
Only when the reference target is a Step can the value of attribute internalRefTargetType be irtt08.
Only when the reference target is a Graphic can the value of attribute internalRefTargetType be irtt09.
Only when the reference target is a Para can the value of attribute internalRefTargetType be irtt51.
Only when the reference target is a hotspot can the value of attribute internalRefTargetType be irtt11.
Only when the reference target is a multimediaObject can the value of attribute internalRefTargetType be irtt10.

structureObjectRule.objectUse: sdc - 1 to 3 alphanumeric characters, not the UOC
identExtension is optional
countryIsoCode
structureObjectRule.objectValue: The project is written in simplified english using Websters dictionary

structureObjectRule.objectUse: languageIsoCode
structureObjectRule.objectValue: The project is written in simplified english
The project is written in english

structureObjectRule.objectUse: Issued or released data module should have always issue number starting 001 and its increaments.
Exchange of draft data publications not allowed.
Day of Issue
structureObjectRule.objectValue: Day from 1 to 31 to be used.

structureObjectRule.objectUse: Month of Issue
structureObjectRule.objectValue: Month from 01 to 12 to be used.

structureObjectRule.objectUse: Year of Issue
structureObjectRule.objectValue: Year from 2010 to 2099 to be used.

structureObjectRule.objectUse: techName must be used
infoName must be used
sourceDmIdent is not allowed in this project.
Issue type of data module.
Security classification
structureObjectRule.objectValue: Confidentiality is imposed by the authority.
Confidentiality is requested by the customers.

structureObjectRule.objectUse: Data Restrictions are not allowed in the data modules level.
reference to the manufacturers, projects or sponsors logotype are not used in this project
responsiblePartnerCompany/@enterpriseCode will be used
Update the applicable Enterprise Name for the enterprise code.
originator/@enterpriseCode will be used
Update the applicable Enterprise Name for the enterprise code.
applicCrossRefTableRef not allowed.
Applicability must be defined in the simple para tag as "ALL".
Update with applicable BREX Data module reference with effective Issues available.
All the data module should contain Unverified, first or Second verification as quality assurance.
Identifies a data module which has been first verified.
structureObjectRule.objectValue: Indicate that the first verification was carried out on a desktop
Indicate that the first verification was carried out at the Product
Indicate that the first verification was carried out at the Product and on a desktop

structureObjectRule.objectUse: Identifies a data module which has been second verified.
structureObjectRule.objectValue: Indicate that the first verification was carried out on a desktop
Indicate that the first verification was carried out at the Product
Indicate that the first verification was carried out at the Product and on a desktop

structureObjectRule.objectUse: systemBreakdownCode will not be used
functionalItemCode will not be used
functionalItemRef will not be used
skillLevel is not allowed
Safety label may be Alert or Standard
structureObjectRule.objectValue: Must be marked to mitigate matters requiring urgent attention.
Must be marked to mitigate matters that does requires Alert.
Must be marked to mitigate matters that does requires airworthinessLimitations.

structureObjectRule.objectUse: This element is used to record the general remarks. No speical charaters allowed.
Reason for update should always follow naming convention of rfu-XXX
Indicates the type of the reason for update that it applies to and is configurable
structureObjectRule.objectValue: Editorial Changes with no change marker.
Changes related to issue type change.

structureObjectRule.objectUse: Highlights will be updated during revision and changes.
structureObjectRule.objectValue: Reason for update will not appear in the highlights data module.
Reason for update appears in the highlights data module.

structureObjectRule.objectUse: Contains the authority that owns the source data from which the data module is written.

Used for recording deficiency reports, special technical orders, service bulletins, explanations of excluded and additional modifications, and similar documents.

structureObjectRule.objectUse: This element is used to record the general remarks. No speical charaters allowed.
Reason for update should always follow naming convention of rfu-XXX
Indicates the type of the reason for update that it applies to and is configurable

structureObjectRule.objectUse: Highlights will be updated during revision and changes.

structureObjectRule.objectUse: Contains the authority that owns the source data from which the data module is written.
techPubBase not allowed
Used for recording deficiency reports, special technical orders, service bulletins, explanations of excluded and additional modifications, and similar documents.
Figure number must be populated with 2 numeric characters
Figure number variant must be populated with 1 alpha characters
Indenture must be populated with 1 numeric characters
Item number
Item number
Initial Provisioning Project References are not allowed.
Item Sequence number must be populated with 3 Alpha numeric characters
Characteristic of the part
structureObjectRule.objectValue: Flight safety and critical aircraft part

structureObjectRule.objectUse: Characteristic of the part
Usable on code equipment are not allowed.
Restricted Operation Note are not allowed.
Interchangeability
Category One Container Location are not allowed.
SB number
Interchangeability
Change Authority Manufacturer Code Value
ILS numbers are not allowed.
location Rcmd Segment are not allowed.
Only value 1 should be used to identify the attaching part in IPL; 2 and 3 are not allowed to identify storage and shipping part.
Location description information are not allowed.
Installation location information are not allowed.
References to Initial Provisioning Project are not allowed.
Select Or Manufacture From Identure are not allowed.
Part Manufacturer Code are mandatory.
Customer stock number are not allowed.
Limited part number information are not allowed.
NATO stock number information are not allowed.
Over Length Part Number (if any)
Procurement data are not allowed.
ETOPs flags are not allowed.
Calibration Marker are not allowed.
Fitment Code are not allowed.
Hazardous Class are not allowed.
Part Usage Code are permitted.
structureObjectRule.objectValue: None of the other codes applies

structureObjectRule.objectUse: Physical Security Pilferage Code are not allowed.
Placard Text are allowed.
Quantity are not allowed for Non S2000M and Non Chapterized IPD in Techdata.
Spare Part Class Code are permitted.
Spec Document information are not allowed.
Special Storage information are not allowed.
Unit Of Issue information are not allowed.
Unit Of Issue Qualification Segment information are not allowed.
Altered Part Manufacturer Code are mandatory.
Altered Part number value are mandatory.
Local Fabrication Material Manufacturer Code are mandatory.
Local Fabrication Material Part number value are mandatory.
Optional Part Manufacturer Code are mandatory.
Optional Part number value are mandatory.
Preferred Spare Part Manufacturer Code are mandatory.
Preferred Spare Part number value are mandatory.
Replaced By Part Manufacturer Code are mandatory.
Replaced By Part number value are mandatory.
Removal or Installation Quantity are not allowed.
Total Quantity are not allowed.
References or attributes related to Initial Provisioning Project are not allowed.
Functional Item References are allowed to add the Equipment Designators.
Assy Code must be populated with 2 numeric characters
Assy Code must be populated with 2 numeric characters
Assy Code must be populated with 1 alpha characters
Infocode must be 3 alphanumeric characters

Issue type of data module.
Security classification
structureObjectRule.objectValue: Confidentiality is imposed by the authority.
Confidentiality is requested by the customers.

structureObjectRule.objectUse: When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt77", the pmEntryTitle should be Proprietary Information
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt51", the pmEntryTitle should be Front matter

structureObjectRule.objectPath: //pmEntry[@pmEntryType='pmt52' and not(matches(pmEntryTitle,'^(TRANSMITTAL INFORMATION)|(Functional and technical descriptions)$'))]
structureObjectRule.objectUse: When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt52", the pmEntryTitle should be TRANSMITTAL INFORMATION or "Functional and technical descriptions"

structureObjectRule.objectPath: //pmEntry[@pmEntryType='pmt53' and not(matches(pmEntryTitle,'^(RECORD OF REVISIONS)|(Description of function)$'))]
structureObjectRule.objectUse: When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt53", the pmEntryTitle should be RECORD OF REVISIONS or "Description of function"

structureObjectRule.objectPath: //pmEntry[@pmEntryType='pmt54' and not(matches(pmEntryTitle,'^(RECORD OF TEMPORARY REVISIONS)|(Technical description)$'))]
structureObjectRule.objectUse: When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt54", the pmEntryTitle should be RECORD OF TEMPORARY REVISIONS
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt55", the pmEntryTitle should be SERVICE BULLETIN LIST
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt56", the pmEntryTitle should be LIST OF EFFECTIVE PAGES
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt57", the pmEntryTitle should be Diagrams and schematics
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt58", the pmEntryTitle should be INTRODUCTION or "Maintenance and servicing"
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt59", the pmEntryTitle should be DESCRIPTION AND OPERATION or "Task sets"
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt60", the pmEntryTitle should be TESTING AND FAULT ISOLATION
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt61", the pmEntryTitle should be SCHEMATIC AND WIRING DIAGRAMS
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt62", the pmEntryTitle should be either of DISASSEMBLY, "General Check" or "Servicing"

structureObjectRule.objectPath: //pmEntry[@pmEntryType='pmt63' and not(matches(pmEntryTitle,'^(CLEANING)|(INSPECTION/CHECK)|(Examination, test, checks and fault isolation)$'))]
structureObjectRule.objectUse: When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt63", the pmEntryTitle should be either of CLEANING, "Inspection/Check" or "Examination, test, checks and fault isolation"

structureObjectRule.objectPath: //pmEntry[@pmEntryType='pmt64' and not(matches(pmEntryTitle,'^(INSPECTION/CHECK)|(CONTINUE-TIME CHECK)|(Disconnect, remove and disassemble procedures)$'))]
structureObjectRule.objectUse: When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt64", the pmEntryTitle should be either of INSPECTION/CHECK, "Continue-Time Check" or "Disconnect, remove and disassemble procedures"
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt65", the pmEntryTitle should be either of REPAIR, "Zero-Time Check" or "Repair instructions"

structureObjectRule.objectPath: //pmEntry[@pmEntryType='pmt66' and not(matches(pmEntryTitle,'^(ASSEMBLY)|(GENERAL REPAIR)|(Assemble, install and reconnect procedures)$'))]
structureObjectRule.objectUse: When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt66", the pmEntryTitle should be either of ASSEMBLY, "General Repair" or "Assemble, install and reconnect procedures"

structureObjectRule.objectPath: //pmEntry[@pmEntryType='pmt67' and not(matches(pmEntryTitle,'^(FITS AND CLEARANCES)|(Storage procedures and data)$'))]
structureObjectRule.objectUse: When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt67", the pmEntryTitle should be FITS AND CLEARANCES or "Storage procedures and data"

structureObjectRule.objectPath: //pmEntry[@pmEntryType='pmt68' and not(matches(pmEntryTitle,'^(SPECIAL TOOLS, FIXTURES, EQUIPMENT AND CONSUMABLES)$'))]
structureObjectRule.objectUse: When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt68", the pmEntryTitle should be SPECIAL TOOLS, FIXTURES, EQUIPMENT AND CONSUMABLES
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt69", the pmEntryTitle should be SPECIAL PROCEDURES or "Illustrated parts data"
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt70", the pmEntryTitle should be REMOVAL or "IPD Introduction"
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt71", the pmEntryTitle should be INSTALLATION or "Illustrated Parts Data"
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt72", the pmEntryTitle should be SERVICING
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt73", the pmEntryTitle should be STORAGE (INCLUDING TRANSPORTATION)
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt74", the pmEntryTitle should be REWORK (SERVICE BULLETIN ACCOMPLISHMENT PROCEDURES)
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt75", the pmEntryTitle should be ILLUSTRATED PARTS LIST
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt78", the pmEntryTitle should be General Check
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt79", the pmEntryTitle should be Inspection/Check
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt80", the pmEntryTitle should be Continue-Time Check or "Description and Operation"
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt81", the pmEntryTitle should be Zero-Time Check or "Fault Isolation"
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt82", the pmEntryTitle should be General Repair
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt83", the pmEntryTitle should be Repair or "Maintenance Practices"
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt84", the pmEntryTitle should be Repair or "Servicing"
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt85", the pmEntryTitle should be "APPENDIX" or Removal and Installation
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt86", the pmEntryTitle should be Heavy Maintenance or "Adjustment and Test"
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt87", the pmEntryTitle should be Inspection and Check
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt88", the pmEntryTitle should be Cleaning and painting
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt89", the pmEntryTitle should be Approved Repairs
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt90", the pmEntryTitle should be Vendor Codes
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt91", the pmEntryTitle should be Section 1
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt92", the pmEntryTitle should be Section 2
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt93", the pmEntryTitle should be Section 3
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt94", the pmEntryTitle should be Section 4
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt95", the pmEntryTitle should be Section 5
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt96", the pmEntryTitle should be Section 6
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt97", the pmEntryTitle should be Section 7
When the pmEntryType attribute is set to "pmt99", the pmEntryTitle should be Section 8
